transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Casque of the Walking Mountain

effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to start a inning Streak! increasing the damage of Rampage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.
Rampage has a 15% chance to end your inning Streak!

(4) Set: When you gain a stack of inning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Peaks of the Walking Mountain

name: Sleeveless T-Shirt
description: On the inside collar it reads, 'Inspected by Earl Z. Moade.'

effects.display_string: Set: Bloodthirst increases the damage of your next Rampage by 15%.
(4) Set: When Raging Blow resets its own cooldown, the damage of your next Bloodthirst is increased by 20%, stacking up to 2 times.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Crimson Gladiator's Plate Gauntlets

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 331 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 77,294 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 115,947.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
